external_games.name: G-MODEアーカイブス01 フライハイトクラウディア

name: G-Mode Archives 01: Flyhight Cloudia
storyline:
Cloudia, a world in the sky, where floating islands are scattered in the sea of clouds.

Reinas, the cavalry platoon leader of the Kaisershult Empire, is ordered by the king and goes to conquer Badelsen Island with his ally Ronald.

Reinas and Ronald launch a surprise attack on the command tower of the island. Reinus successfully conquered the command tower, but he was not satisfied with the military's way of slaughtering citizens and confronted with Ronald. Reinas, who was convicted of treason, is chased from the Kaisershult army.

The increasing number of mysterious magical beasts, the suspicious rumors of King Kaisersult, and the entrance to a different space. The journey of Reinus, where various fates intersect, begins now...
summary:
A JRPG whose story takes place in the sky!

Set in the empty world "Cloudia", an orthodox RPG that emphasizes the scenario.

The story begins when Reinas, the knight of the great power, Kaisersult, marches to the neighboring island "Badersen".

In the world of Claudia, which controls airships and travels between floating islands scattered in the sea of clouds, a dramatic scenario with a variety of events will be developed.

With a unique combat system (multiweight battle) that can be easily operated, it reproduces speed and exhilarating action at the same time. You can enjoy powerful battle scenes with magic and special moves full of effects.
